8 void print_node_and_children(const xmlpp::Node* node, std::ofstream& text_from_body_file, unsigned int indentation = 0)
9 {
10  //std::cout << std::endl; //Separate nodes by an empty line.
11 
12  const xmlpp::ContentNode* nodeContent = dynamic_cast<const xmlpp::ContentNode*>(node);
13  const xmlpp::TextNode* nodeText = dynamic_cast<const xmlpp::TextNode*>(node);
14 // const xmlpp::CommentNode* nodeComment = dynamic_cast<const xmlpp::CommentNode*>(node);
15 
16  if(nodeText && nodeText->is_white_space()) //Let's ignore the indenting - you don't always want to do this.
17  return;
18 
19  Glib::ustring nodename = node->get_name();
20 
21 
22  if(!nodeText && !nodeComment && !nodename.empty()) //Let's not say "name: text".
23  {
24  print_indentation(indentation);
25  std::cout << "Node name = " << node->get_name() << std::endl;
26  std::cout << "Node name = " << nodename << std::endl;
27  }
28  else if(nodeText) //Let's say when it's text. - e.g. let's say what that white space is.
29  if(nodeText)
30  {
31  print_indentation(indentation);
32  std::cout << "Text Node" << std::endl;
33  }
34 
35  Treat the various node types differently:
36  if(nodeText)
37  {
38  print_indentation(indentation);
39  std::cout << "text = \"" << nodeText->get_content() << "\"" << std::endl;
40  text_from_body_file << nodeText->get_content() << std::endl;
41  }
42  else if(nodeComment)
43  {
44  print_indentation(indentation);
45  std::cout << "comment = " << nodeComment->get_content() << std::endl;
46  }
47  else if(nodeContent)
48  {
49  print_indentation(indentation);
50  std::cout << "content = " << nodeContent->get_content() << std::endl;
51  }
52  else if(const xmlpp::Element* nodeElement = dynamic_cast<const xmlpp::Element*>(node))
53  {
54  //A normal Element node:
55 
56  //line() works only for ElementNodes.
57  print_indentation(indentation);
58  std::cout << " line = " << node->get_line() << std::endl;
59 
60  //Print attributes:
61  const xmlpp::Element::AttributeList& attributes = nodeElement->get_attributes();
62  for(xmlpp::Element::AttributeList::const_iterator iter = attributes.begin(); iter != attributes.end(); ++iter)
63  {
64  const xmlpp::Attribute* attribute = *iter;
65  print_indentation(indentation);
66  std::cout << " Attribute " << attribute->get_name() << " = " << attribute->get_value() << std::endl;
67  }
68 
69  const xmlpp::Attribute* attribute = nodeElement->get_attribute("title");
70  if(attribute)
71  {
72  std::cout << "title found: =" << attribute->get_value() << std::endl;
73 
74  }
75  }
76 
77  if(!nodeContent)
78  {
79  //Recurse through child nodes:
80  xmlpp::Node::NodeList list = node->get_children();
81  for(xmlpp::Node::NodeList::iterator iter = list.begin(); iter != list.end(); ++iter)
82  {
83  print_node_and_children(*iter, text_from_body_file, indentation + 2); //recursive
84  }
85  }
